snippet: The Guggenheim Abu Dhabi isn’t going to open for a couple of years, but a fall exhibition will offer a small preview of its collection.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art; exhibit previewing Guggenheim Abu Dhabi collection opens at Manarat Al Saadiyat center; 1733 portrait by British artist William Hoare of Bath depicting Ayuba Suleiman Diallo, Muslim who was victim of Atlantic slave trade, is to go on view at Yorktown Victory Center; Hauser & Wirth settles on Los Angeles location for its latest outpost Hauser Wirth & Schimmel.
lead_paragraph: The Guggenheim Abu Dhabi isn’t going to open for a couple of years, but a fall exhibition will offer a small preview of its collection.

headline.main: Guggenheim Abu Dhabi Plans a Preview Show
headline.print_headline: Guggenheim Abu Dhabi Plans a Preview Show
